item.title: Web Performer
item.description: Web 性能 graph LR perf[Web 性能] -- load[加载快] perf -- work[运行快] click work callNotes "work" perf -- response[服务器的返回快] perf -- self[web 自身加载快和渲染快] self -- js[JavaScript] js -- jsminify[压缩 minify] jsminify -- webpackmode[webpack mode:production] jsminify -- babeljs[babel babel-preset-minify] jsminify -- gulpjs[gulp gulp-uglify] js -- asyncdefer[Async && Defer] click asyncdefer callNotes "asyncdefer" js -- codecomplit[代码分割] click codecomplit callNotes "codecomplit" js -- dependences[优化代码依赖] click dependences callNotes "dependences" self -- css[CSS] css -- cssminify[压缩 minify] cssminify -- webpackcss[webpack postcss-loader] click webpackcss callNotes "
